events.name: score
events.comment: How many hamburgers the player has successfully served

events.name: lives
events.comment: How many lives the player has left. Every time the player fails to deliver an order in time, they lose a life

children.text: Spawn an ingredient in a specific slot.

children.functionDescription: Spawn an ingredient in a specific slot

children.text: Setup.
Spawn starting ingredients.
Process the act of dragging an ingredient.

actions.text: Move dragged ingredient to the top of the layer.
Create a new identical ingredient and place it on the bottom of the layer.

children.text: Process the act of dropping an ingredient.
Ingredient [b]IS NOT[/b] a hamburger meat.
Ingredients can only be placed if the bread doesn't already have it.

actions.text: Put ingredient inside the bread | disable its DragDrop behavior and collisions | update the bread status and hierarchy.
Put ingredient inside the bread | disable its DragDrop behavior and collisions | update the bread status and hierarchy.
Put ingredient inside the bread | disable its DragDrop behavior and collisions | update the bread status and hierarchy.

children.text: If the bread already has the same type of ingredient, the dragged ingredient is destroyed.
Ingredient [b]IS[/b] a hamburger meat.
Hamburger dropped on top of a grill.

actions.text: Put hamburger on the grill and update the grill status.

children.text: Hamburger dropped on the bread.
Invalid position.
Invalid ingredient state.
Add 1 to grillTime when grillTimer is triggered.
If the hamburger got burned, it is no longer draggable (player loses a grill slot) and smoke appears to indicate the event.
Check if a grill has a hamburger on top.
Bread dragged.
Bread dropped.

actions.text: Hot-encode all of the current bread ingredient bools to allow for a more compact boolean comparison.

children.text: Serve the bread.
If a compatible order is detected, destroy it (since it was delivered), add to the player's score and update TextScore text.
If score is a multiple of 5, make the game slightly more difficult
Invalid position.

actions.text: Put bread back on top of BreadSlot and open it.

children.text: Move orders every tick.
If the order goes outside the screen, destroy it.
If the player has 0 lives left, it is game over.
Otherwise, subtract a life and update TextLives text
Otherwise, just move it.
Spawn a new order.
